headline: Ask HN: What will it take to destroy the Ads market?
description:
The more I live the more it seems like we're living in a soulless dystopia:

- My local state TV channels feature 20 minutes of commercials for about 5 minutes of actual content - YouTube shows more and more ads as time goes by - Can't go in the street without being bombarded by ads wherever you look - Whenever you Google something, the top results are SEO spam websites with jumping ads and auto-playing videos that quite literally feel like some form of digital cancer - Services are starting to display ads even if you're a paying costumer -- e.g Samsung TVs

At which point enough is enough? They've stripped humanity out of these daily tasks so much that I can't imagine this is sustainable. What will be the last straw in this market?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 要怎样才能摧毁广告市场？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 要怎樣才能摧毀廣告市場？
description_zh-Hans:
我活得越久，就越觉得我们生活在一个没有灵魂的二元世界里：

- 我当地的国家电视频道有20分钟的广告，而实际内容只有5分钟。 - 随着时间的推移，YouTube上的广告越来越多。 - 走在大街上，无论你看哪里，都会被广告轰炸。 - Whenever you Google something, the top results are SEO spam websites with jumping ads and auto-playing videos that quite literally feel like some form of digital cancer - Services are starting to display ads even if you're a paying costumer -- e.g Samsung TVs

At which point enough is enough? 他们已经把人性从这些日常任务中剥离出来，以至于我无法想象这是否可以持续。这个市场的最后一根稻草会是什么？
description_zh-Hant:
我活得越久，就越覺得我們生活在一個沒有靈魂的二元世界裡：

- 我當地的國家電視頻道有20分鐘的廣告，而實際內容只有5分鐘。 - 隨著時間的推移，YouTube上的廣告越來越多。 - 走在大街上，無論你看哪裡，都會被廣告轟炸。 - Whenever you Google something, the top results are SEO spam websites with jumping ads and auto-playing videos that quite literally feel like some form of digital cancer - Services are starting to display ads even if you're a paying costumer -- e.g Samsung TVs

At which point enough is enough? 他們已經把人性從這些日常任務中剝離出來，以至於我無法想象這是否可以持續。這個市場的最後一根稻草會是什麼？
